title: Is Britain Turning on Boris Johnson? (with Colum Eastwood MP)
itunes:title: Is Britain Turning on Boris Johnson? (with Colum Eastwood MP)
description:
Is the public getting fed up with the government they elected just six months ago? Michelle Harrison, global CEO of Kantar's public division, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why Boris Johnson is suffering in the polls.

But first, Colum Eastwood, leader of the SDLP and MP for Foyle, joins to talk about the dual impact of coronavirus and Brexit on Northern Ireland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
